Title: The Mistress
Actors: Bibi Andersson, Max von Sydow, Per Myrberg
Plot: A love triangle through the four seasons. A young woman, living in a relationship, falls in love with a married man. If someone had told her that she in a few months should be the man's mistress, she would become aggrieved and indignant. She was certainly not a woman who would mess with married men.
